function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Research institutions working 24/7 on drug and vaccine development","Impact":"Potential health risks due to unverified drugs or vaccines","Mitigation":"Careful clinical trials and regulatory approval before mass distribution","Technologies":"Clinical trial data analysis, regulatory compliance software","People":"Public, patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Existing remedies being re-purposed to combat COVID-19","Impact":"Unintended side effects or drug interactions","Mitigation":"Thorough clinical trials and monitoring of patient outcomes","Technologies":"Pharmacovigilance software, real-time patient monitoring systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Plasma therapy against COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of transmission of other diseases through plasma","Mitigation":"Screening and testing of plasma donors, pathogen reduction technologies","Technologies":"Plasma pathogen reduction systems, donor screening kits","People":"Patients receiving plasma therapy, healthcare workers","Owner":"Blood banks, healthcare organizations"}]}
